Always returns [[false]] for a soldier. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isManualFire''' vehicleName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on February 5, 2017 - 05:35 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:AgentRevolution|AgentRev]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Manual fire means the [[effectiveCommander]] of the vehicle controls firing (but not aiming) of the [[gunner]] turret weapons (usually path [0]), while unable to fire his own weapons.
</dd>
</dl>
